command.description: Command to run for each item. <item> will be replaced with the item.

items.description: List of items to run the command for.

glob.description: Glob to get items from. <path> will be replaced with the path to the file, <fileName> will be replaced with the file name, <fileExt> will be replaced with the file extension.

parallel.description: Run the commands in parallel. Default: true.
